text:
The Lycaeum is the easternmost quarter of
[[Metrol]] and once had much in common with the
[[University District]] of [[Sharn]]. Cut off from the
rest of Metrol by the [[River Melandor]] and connected to [[Crown Point]] via the Crown Bridge, it was a city
within a city designed to support the student
population. The Lycaeum today lies nearly entirely within the [[dead-gray mists]] of the [[Mournland]].

The Lycaeum, clustered around the
[[Vermishard of Lore]], included a large public
school, a few smaller boarding schools, and
several universities—the most prestigious of
which were the [[Wynarn Institute of Art]], as well as the [[Vermishard Academy|Vermishard of Lore]] atop the
central spire. The area also included taverns
catering to the student population and housing
for the staff (some of which was in the Lycaeum’s
[[Undercity|Metrol Undercity]]). 

!! Noteworthy Locations

* The [[Vermishard of Lore]]
* The [[Wynarn Institute of Art]]
* [[Olladra Smiles]]
* The former [[Demesne of Shadow|Demesne of Shadow (Metrol)]]
title: Lycaeum
